entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Liverpool
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:11 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.1°C

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 near midnight then light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
